## ComponentManager.getComponents() method

Gets all the components with the specified capability.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getComponents<T>(capability: string | Capability<T>, sorted: boolean): T[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  capability | string \| Capability&lt;T&gt; | The capability of the component. |
|  sorted | boolean | Whether to return list ordered by weights.  The components that match the specified capability. |

<b>Returns:</b>

T\[\]
